page.title: 17DISADVANTAGES OF RURAL LIFE
page.content: OUR SURVEY SHOWS THE MAIN DISADVANTAGE OF LIVING HERE TO BE THE LACK OF {PUBLIC TRANSPORT.}THEREFORE PEOPLE DEPEND ON THEIR OWN CARS AND OFTEN REQUIRE MORE THAN ONE PER FAMILY. TUNBRIDGE WELLS, THE MAIN{RAILWAY STATION TO LONDON IS 15 MILES AWAY. BUXTED,THE NEAREST STATION, GIVES A POOR SERVICE AND DOES NOT GO ANY FURTHER SOUTH THAN UCKFIELD.A POOR{BUS {SERVICE}RUNS IRREGULARLY, WITH NO EVENING OR SUNDAY SERVICE. THERE IS ONLY ONE BUS ROUTE RUNNING FROM HEATHFIELD TO TUNBRIDGE WELLS.{WINTER {TRAVELLING}IS DIFFICULT AS TRACKS TO ISOLATED HOUSES BECOME IMPASSABLE.MORE LIBRARIES, SPORTS AND OTHER{FACILITIES ARE IN GREAT NEED. LOCAL SHOPS ARE EXPENSIVE AND CANNOT COMPETE WITH THE INCREASING NUMBER OF{SHOPPING}CENTRES WHICH PROVIDE CHEAPER FOOD AND OTHER COMMODITIES AND PARKING UNDER ONE ROOF
